name: Drip Drop (itch) (alancocanour)
description:
Controls:

  • Keyboard: Arrow keys + X
  • Mouse / Touch: Just left click
  • Gamepad: Joystick + X button

You can view the tutorial again from the pause menu which is accessed by pressing "P", "Enter", or the "-" button if you are playing on a mobile device.

The downloadable versions of the game are identical to the web version.
